name: Classic Vegan Coleslaw
description: Classic Vegan Coleslaw made with the perfect dressing and ready in 5 minutes. This is the perfect dish for summer cookouts and potlucks! Oil free & healthy.
recipeIngredient: 5 cups coleslaw mix with red cabbage and carrots
1/2 cup Vegan Mayo  (or use store bought vegan mayo )

recipeInstructions.text: Add the vegan mayo, granulated sugar, apple cider vinegar, salt and celery seed to a large mixing bowl and whisk together until fully combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the vegan mayo, granulated sugar, apple cider vinegar, salt and celery seed to a large mixing bowl and whisk together until fully combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the coleslaw mix and stir well. Cover, and refrigerate for at least 2 hours before serving, if possible.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the coleslaw mix and stir well. Cover, and refrigerate for at least 2 hours before serving, if possible.
